mapper.select: select c.start_period,c.work_place, e.hourly_wage from Employee e,Contract c where e.C_code= c.C_code AND c.p_id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(rownum) FROM Employee WHERE M_code=#{m_code} AND rownum > 0

SELECT start_period,work_place,hourly_wage FROM (SELECT rownum rn, c.start_period,c.work_place,e.hourly_wage from Employee e,Contract c where e.C_code= c.C_code AND c.p_id=#{id} order by c.start_period desc) WHERE rn >= #{pageStart} AND rn <= (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum})

SELECT BASIC_SALARY, FOOD_EXPENSES, TRANSPORTATION_FEE, YEAR_MONTH, ACTUAL_SALARY, TOTAL_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, ADDITIONAL_EXTENDED, ADDITIONAL_NIGHT, em_code, work_place FROM salary_view WHERE em_code = (SELECT em_code FROM employee WHERE m_code = ${#{m_code})

SELECT BASIC_SALARY, FOOD_EXPENSES, TRANSPORTATION_FEE, YEAR_MONTH, ACTUAL_SALARY, TOTAL_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, ADDITIONAL_EXTENDED, ADDITIONAL_NIGHT, em_code, work_place, work_hours, work_minute FROM salary_view WHERE m_code = 'p'||SUBSTR(#{id},INSTR(#{id},'/')+1) AND SUBSTR(em_code,0,INSTR(em_code,'/')-1) = SUBSTR(#{id},0,INSTR(#{id},'/')-1)
SELECT c.join_date, c.work_place, c.end_date, m.name FROM career c, member m WHERE c.m_code = #{m_code} AND c.m_code = m.m_code ORDER BY c.join_date desc
